forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind 8 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In the soft embrace of morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens shrouded in a gentle veiling of clouds, a familiar cloak that holds the city in a tranquil lull. The air, tinged with the crispness of a lower temperature settling around fifty degrees, whispers promises of fleeting sun as the day unfolds towards the high of fifty-eight. A west wind rustles softly, nudging the clouds to part and reveal shards of blue sky, yet the afternoon may cloak the warmth once more, falling back to a more tempered fifty-six.

Under the muted gray skies, the beauty of San Francisco emerges with an ethereal quality. Though the fog lingers at the edges, it does so with grace, softening the hard lines of buildings and bridging the bay with a dreamlike quality. This is a moment to appreciate the juxtaposition of the city’s vibrant life against a backdrop of solitude and stillness. For a day such as this, layering is wise; a light jacket, paired with comfortable shoes, will suit your wanderings well. Embrace the charm of wandering through the quieter streets, perhaps indulging in a warm cup of coffee at one of the cozy local cafés, where the air is fragrant with freshly baked goods. A leisurely afternoon stroll along the Embarcadero offers a chance to catch glimpses of the ever-changing bay, as the winds shift and the marine layer plays hide and seek.
